verses.verse: Ask<WH7592> you of the Lord<WH3068> rain<WH4306> in the time<WH6256> of the latter rain<WH4456>; so the Lord<WH3068> shall make<WH6213> bright clouds<WH2385>, and give<WH5414> them showers<WH1653> of rain<WH4306>, to every one<WH376> grass<WH6212> in the field<WH7704>.

For the idols<WH8655> have spoken<WH1696> vanity<WH205>, and the diviners<WH7080> have seen<WH2372> a lie<WH8267>, and have told<WH1696> false<WH7723> dreams<WH2472>; they comfort<WH5162> in vain<WH1892>: therefore they went<WH5265> their way as a flock<WH6629>, they were troubled<WH6031>, because there was no shepherd<WH7462>.

My anger<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> against the shepherds<WH7462>, and I punished<WH6485> the goats<WH6260>: for the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> has visited<WH6485> his flock<WH5739> the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>, and has made<WH7760> them as his good<WH1935> horse<WH5483> in the battle<WH4421>.
Out of him came forth<WH3318> the corner<WH6438>, out of him the nail<WH3489>, out of him the battle<WH4421> bow<WH7198>, out of him every oppressor<WH5065> together<WH3162>.

And they shall be as mighty<WH1368> men<WH947>, which tread down their enemies in the mire<WH2916> of the streets<WH2351> in the battle<WH4421>: and they shall fight<WH3898>, because the Lord<WH3068> is with them<WH7392>, and the riders on horses<WH5483> shall be confounded<WH3001>.

And I will strengthen<WH1396> the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>, and I will save<WH3467> the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130>, and I will bring them again to place<WH3427> them<WH7355>; for I have mercy upon them<WH834>: and they shall be as though I had not cast them off<WH2186>: for I am the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430>, and will hear them<WH6030>.

And they of Ephraim<WH669> shall be like a mighty<WH1368> man<WH3820>, and their heart shall rejoice<WH8055> as through wine<WH3196>: Yes<WH1121>, their sons shall see<WH7200> it<WH8055>, and be glad; their heart<WH3820> shall rejoice<WH1523> in the Lord<WH3068>.
I will hiss<WH8319> for them<WH6908>, and gather them<WH6299>; for I have redeemed them<WH7235>: and they shall increase as they have increased<WH7235>.
And I will sow<WH2232> them among the people<WH5971>: and they shall remember<WH2142> me in far countries<WH4801>; and they shall live<WH2421> with their sons<WH1121>, and turn again<WH7725>.

I will bring them again<WH7725> also out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and gather<WH6908> them out of Assyria<WH804>; and I will bring<WH935> them into the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> and Lebanon<WH3844>; and place shall not be found for them<WH4672>.

And he shall pass through<WH5674> the sea<WH3220> with affliction<WH6869>, and shall strike<WH5221> the waves<WH1530> in the sea<WH3220>, and all the deeps<WH4688> of the river<WH2975> shall dry up<WH3001>: and the pride<WH1347> of Assyria<WH804> shall be brought down<WH3381>, and the scepter<WH7626> of Egypt<WH4714> shall depart away<WH5493>.
And I will strengthen<WH1396> them in the Lord<WH3068>; and they shall walk up and down<WH1980> in his name<WH8034>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.
